name: Furious Focus, Mythic

sections.body: When you are using Furious Focus, you don't take Power Attack's penalty on attack rolls that are made as attacks of opportunity. As a free action, you can expend one use of mythic power to negate Power Attack's penalty on all melee attacks you make for 1 round while using this feat.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your attacks create a rhythmic barrage that doesn't sacrifice precision for force.
